body_html: device_code.cc is actually a file from a template that ships with the CUDA SDK (cuda/bin/crt/link.stub). I will prepare a CL to replace that include along with the other substitutions. In the meantime, you can install NCCL and specify the version and install location during ./configure.

body: device_code.cc is actually a file from a template that ships with the CUDA SDK (cuda/bin/crt/link.stub). I will prepare a CL to replace that include along with the other substitutions. In the meantime, you can install NCCL and specify the version and install location during ./configure.
